content: Write a poem about childhood with exactly 80 words.

Childhood, oh sweet childhood,
A time of wonder and play.
Laughing, chasing, exploring,
Every day felt like a holiday.

Building sandcastles and treehouses,
Dressing up in make-believe clothes.
Learning to ride a bicycle,
Falling and getting back up, no woes.

Ice cream on a hot summer day,
Fireflies dancing in the twilight's gray.
Bedtime stories and goodnight hugs,
Dreaming of adventures, far and snug.

Childhood, oh precious time,
Forever etched in our hearts, sublime.
